```{r}
library(tidyverse)
data <- read_csv('raw_data.csv')
```


```{r}
primary <- c('INCIDENT - BICYCLE', 'THEFT OVER - BICYCLE',
             'THEFT OF EBIKE OVER $5000', 'THEFT OF EBIKE UNDER $5000',
             'THEFT UNDER - BICYCLE')
bike_primary <- data |>
  filter(PRIMARY_OFFENCE %in% primary)
```
